ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the mountains like tufts of coloured wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the mountains will become like dyed tufts of wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the mountains become like wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the hills will be light as wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the mountains will be like `Ihn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains shall be as tufts of wool
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the mountains shall be as plucked wool-tufts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the hills become as flakes of wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the mountains will become like tufts of wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And then the mountains shall become like Unto wool dyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains like [tufts of] dyed wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains will be like wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains will be like flakes of wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the mountains shall be like puffs of wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains will be like tufted wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains will be like wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:9] and the mountains will be as flakes of wool, in terms of [their] lightness and [their] floating about in the wind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the hills become as flakes of wool,
